name: Jam-mare
description:
Developed at BUG SPRING JAM 2018

Game Story : You're trapped inside GameJam. And you will try to get out of here and go home.

Producers : Adil Furkan Yıldırım, Mehmet Berkay Topal, Batuhan Ünsal, Korhan Sonbahar

Jam-mare Version 2  [Fixed Version]
-Some bug fixes
-Resizing fixes
-Collider fixes
